reuters.title: HAMBURGISCHE LB BOND RAISED TO 75 MLN CANADIAN DLRS
reuters.body: The Hamburgische Landesbank Girozentrale Canadian dollar bond issued earlier today due May 6, 1990 at 8-1/4 pct and 101-3/8 has been increased to 75 mln dlrs, said Merrill Lynch Capital Markets as lead manager. REUTER 
